text: Hey guys, has anyone got a custom code snippet for creating a note engagement? Could do with adding system notes in a record timeline via workflows

Hi all, i have a question and i really don't know who to ask - we have a sign-up form on our webapp creating contacts in HubSpot via api, but all the contacts have "API" as thier source - is there a way to send the source marketing wants (like organic or social or referral) via the create contact API? if it helps, the user has to visit a HubSpot-hosted page first before they can get to the signup form

Hi all! When importing a contacts csv through the API, someone could set, when mapping properties, the `idColumnType` with the value `HubSpot_ALTERNATE_ID` to the property `hs_object_id`? I know it can be done with the property `email`
Thank <@UD53A9UUR>. Just wanted to ask is there any API available for v3?
not yet!  you can safely use the v1 endpoint

You likely want to swap to the Forms API which allows you to grab the `HubSpotutk` browser cookie and send that with the payload. That will create the contact and associates any tracked behavior with the record.
If that doesn't work for your process and you have Marketing Hub Enterprise, you could also use the identify call of the Tracking Code API
The visitor doesn't have to visit a HubSpot page first if you have the HubSpot tracking code in your web app
The tracking code api doc that I linked to has a section about using the tracking code in a single page app (if that's your app architecture)
